snippet.title: Orange Santa - The Official Steam Trailer (2021)
snippet.description:
#indiegame #christmas #platformer
Check out Orange Santa on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1495460/Orange_Santa/

Orange Santa is a 2D Christmas-Themed Platform Action game based on the story of Orange Santa who is in-charge of the distribution of the Christmas gifts among the children.
